record.dc:title: 122BY13 Ledford Island, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 16BY21 under legs of 16BY19, showing upper ends of tibiae and fibulae under lower ends of femora of 16BY19. Square 0R5. Direction NW.
record.wpa:narrative: [16BY19] Mature male in good condition, extended on back with head to west. Pit from plowzone filled with mixed dark earth. Pit precedent to burial 16BY18. At left knee and beside right femora are three tarsal bones. Seem to have been disturbed by burial 18. Toes under 16BY18 are somewhat disturbed. Calcaneus of 16BY18 was one of bones in pit of 16BY19. [16BY21] Adult male in fair condition, extended on back with head to west. Pit from plowzone showed zoning and was filled with mixed earth. Bones lay above base of pit. Feet extend under 16BY23 pit. Middle of torso lower than skull and pelvis. Feet slightly higher. Sacrum twisted from normal position, but rest of body undisturbed.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustrations available on file. See also photograph 121BY13.
